page.title: 02Nursery schools
page.content: Nursery schools are education for under fives.There are four nursery schools in our area.They are situated on the Chase,Kings Avenue,Slade Road and York Road.They take under fives only.Two of the schools take children all day and two just half a day.They play with pastry and sand and do a lot of activeties outside if the weather is nice.They sing and play games like lotto and dominoes.The nurseries get the children ready for school.If you dont book quickly into a nursery school,you may be disappointed and you may have to wait a year or two because they are fully booked .They have easy books in which the children have to match the different shapes.
